item.title: How to Contribute
item.description: How To Contribute The Projects aims to be a completely community driven initiative that will move according to the demand and usage of the community. The Source code of the project is available Here and is built using Hugo. The indexes are categorised and are added to markdown files with suitable names. They are located inside the ‘posts’ directory which is inside the ‘content’ directory. You can click on the markdown file which you are interested to contribute to and click on the pencil button that is marked in the figure below to edit the content.
item.content:
How To Contribute

The Projects aims to be a completely community driven initiative that will move according to the demand and usage of the community. The Source code of the project is available Here and is built using Hugo. The indexes are categorised and are added to markdown files with suitable names. They are located inside the ‘posts’ directory which is inside the ‘content’ directory.


You can click on the markdown file which you are interested to contribute to and click on the pencil button that is marked in the figure below to edit the content.
Observe the data given and add the links using the same format. You can also refer to the Markdown Cheatsheet to know more on how to manage markdown files. Press on the commit button to submit your entries.

item.title: Index of NITC
item.description: Hi there This Page was devoloped with KISS Philosophy in mind. The website aims to provide Information and it’s corresponding links without having to navigate through a pile of junk. The website is one among the many projects that are devoloped and maintained by students with the help of FOSSCELL NITC you can browse similar projects from projects.fosscell.org. The site plans to collect data with the help of student contribution. Click Here to know how to.
item.content:
Hi there

This Page was devoloped with KISS Philosophy in mind. The website aims to provide Information and it’s corresponding links without having to navigate through a pile of junk. The website is one among the many projects that are devoloped and maintained by students with the help of FOSSCELL NITC you can browse similar projects from projects.fosscell.org.

The site plans to collect data with the help of student contribution.
Click Here to know how to.

item.title: Productivity
item.description: Reactive resume : Reactive Resume is a free and open source resume builder that’s built to make the mundane tasks of creating, updating and sharing your resume easy. Sejda : Easy, pleasant and productive PDF editor. Kanboard : Kanboard is a free and open source Kanban project management software. Rise up pad : This is an etherpad service hosted by Riseup. highly customizable open source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.
item.content:
Reactive resume : Reactive Resume is a free and open source resume builder that’s built to make the mundane tasks of creating, updating and sharing your resume easy.
Sejda : Easy, pleasant and productive PDF editor.
Kanboard : Kanboard is a free and open source Kanban project management software.
Rise up pad : This is an etherpad service hosted by Riseup. highly customizable open source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.
Taiga : The free and open-source project management tool. For cross-functional agile teams to work effectively
Bitwarden : A free and open source password management tool. Can generate unlimited passwords and can be used in unlimited devices \

item.title: Resources
item.description: Sci Hub: The goal of Sci-Hub is to provide free and unrestricted access to all scientific knowledge.
item.content: Sci Hub: The goal of Sci-Hub is to provide free and unrestricted access to all scientific knowledge.
